snippet.title: Ask Ars: Of solid state drives and garbage collection
snippet.description: ... around. TRIM is a command that an OS can issue to help the SSDs realize they have this deleted data problem and fix it. An OS with TRIM support is able to tell an SSD to mark a deleted file..., so that it doesn't get kept around for an inordinate amount of time. TRIM can be a big speed-saver...

snippet.title: Game characters are better when they gossip and lie
snippet.description: ...Getting characters to lie, gossip, and manipulate could help to create more realistic video games... has been working on models to introduce socially competent non-player game characters who can understand natural language, rather than characters using goal-driven dialogue where the player is limited...

snippet.title: Reality blurs between Heavy Rain characters and actors
snippet.description: ...Heavy Rain relies on its characters to deliver much of the gravity and story of the game, but what you might not know is that the actors often provided both the sound and the face of their characters... just how much the character models look like the actors. The resemblance is frightening...
